before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"f95ag","text":"REAGENTS: (All reagents to be prepared fresh for each digestion)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9s2b3","text":"1. 100 mM ammonium bicarbonate (ABC): 0.158 g in 20 mL distilled water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"de85q","text":"2. 50 mM ABC: 0.079g in 20 mL distilled water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3ku0","text":"3. Acetone","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqv46","text":"4. Methanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91pgt","text":"5. 10% sodium dodecyl sulfate (SDS): 1g in 10 mL distilled water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31h39","text":"6. 100 mM DTT: 0.0015g in 100 uLof 100mM ABC (DO NOT mix until directly before you are ready to use)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18g6p","text":"7. 500 mM Iodoacetamide: 0.01g in 100 uL of 100 mM ABC (DO NOT mix until directly before you are ready to use)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"beu4t","text":"8. Trypsin solution: Keep on ice. Promega (cat. # V5113) is already diluted in 50 mM acetic acid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5urog","text":"The protocol is a method to digest a protein mixture obtained from a cell lysis or tissue that is in solution. The protocol includes a precipitation step to clean up the proteins before digestion. The protein mixture can then be digested and the resulting peptides cleaned up using protocol 003 and/or 006.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"28jb8","text":"Pre-cleaned microtubes 1.5 mL - SEAL-RITE‱ 1.5 ML MICROCENTRIFUGE TUBES color: natural, USA Scientific","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bc3gm","text":"Pipette tips - Fisher Brand, yellow, part number: 02-681-151.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4sd9","text":"Reinforced tubes with screw caps and O-rings - Fisher Brand bulk tubes opaque: 15-340-162.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blkd6","text":"Stainless steel balls - 2.4 mm Metal bead media 19-640-3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dka3","text":"15 mL tubes - Nunc 15mL: 339650.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2dun1","text":"BCA - Micro BCA Protein Assay kit, Thermo Scientific: 23235.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1frb2","text":"ABC - Fluka analytical Ammonium Bicarbonate, Sigma Aldrich, 09830-500G","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drvf","text":"DTT - Fisher Bioreagents Dithiothreitol, C4h10o2s2 F.W. 154.24","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epair","text":"IA (Iodoacetamide) - Sigma Aldrich 1149-5G PCode:1002138224","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ajk9","text":"HALT Protease and phosphatase inhibitor cocktail, EDTA free (100x), Thermo Scientific: PI78443.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58p6n","text":"SDS - Sodium dodecyl sulfate, Sigma-Aldrich: L4509.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4eerm","text":"Promega Trypsin: Sequencing grade modified, frozen, V511C, Promega","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2g4n","text":"FA - Fisher chemical A117-50, Formic Acid, optima LC/MS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frnnr","text":"Methanol - A456-212, Methanol, optima LC/MS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fe7qt","text":"Acetone - A929-4, Acetone, optima LC/MS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86pqh","text":"Micropipettes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4s1fm","text":"2 to 20 μL Micropipette - Gilson‱ F144056MT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9n2di","text":"10 to 100 μL Micropipette - Gilson‱ F144057MT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5qce2","text":"20 to 200 μL Micropipette - Gilson‱ F144058MT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6vpc3","text":"100 to 1000 μL Micropipette - Gilson‱ F144059MT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"be19j","text":"VWR Analog Vortex mixer - CAT No: 58816-121","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"flhjk","text":"Centrifuge 5427 R, Eppendorf.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36rfc","text":"Bead Mill 24 Fisher Brand.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3C5A8356DCB711EEAE260A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3C5A8356DCB711EEAE260A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"2":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3C5A8356DCB711EEAE260A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"3":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3C5A8356DCB711EEAE260A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"4":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3C5A8356DCB711EEAE260A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"booat","text":"Add 5X  (volume to mg tissue) of lysis buffer (1% SDS, 100mM AmBiC) to tissue and transfer to Bead Mill 24 reinforced tube with 5 stainless steel balls.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4q9ia","text":"Lyse the cells with Fisher Bead Mill 24 (speed: 5m/s, time: 20 sec, number of cycle: 3, dwell/pause between runs: 10 sec).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"69d7q","text":"Centrifuge lysate at 16,000 x g for 10 min at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7898m","text":"Carefully separate the supernatant and transfer into a new 1.5mL Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77uc","text":"Determine the protein concentration of the supernatant using BCA (5uL of 10X dilution)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2qgu3","text":"Transfer 20ug into a new, pre-washed tube and adjust to a final volume of 100uL with 100mM AmBiC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"au36q","text":"Add 5μL of 10 mM dithiothreitol (DTT) solution for 30 min at RT to reduce.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73o4a","text":"Add 5μL of 50 mM iodoacetamide (IA) solution for 30 min at RT to alkylate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d2vee","text":"12. Add 1 ug of modified trypsin solution overnight at 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2gqt4","text":"13. Add 8uL of formic acid to the sample to quench the reaction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4fa9e","text":"Transfer sample to 15 mL conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"el0n7","text":"Centrifuge sample 1h at 4C at 3200 x g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aauqb","text":"Perform precipitation by adding -20C acetone (1x volume of the sample) and -20C methanol (9 x volume of the sample) and incubate overnight at -80C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9kdp6","text":"Remove supernatant, wash pellet with 1 mL of -20C cold methanol and centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8q916","text":"Remove supernatant, air-dry pellet in the PCR workstation at RT till just damp.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ae55j","text":"Solubilize proteins in 50 uL (more depending on amount of tissue) of 50 mM Ammonium Bicarbonate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b0hp1","text":"Speedvac to dry peptide sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"mia","text":"Samples can be cleaned up using C18 (Protocol 003) and/or Magnetic beads (Protocol 006). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bc46m","text":"Centrifuge samples 1h at 4C at 3200 xg","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"482d1","text":"Remove supernatants, wash pellets with 1 mL of -20C cold methanol and centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"emm0p","text":"Remove supernatants, air-dry pellets in the PCR workstation at RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2gsg0","text":"Solubilize proteins in 50-100 uL of 50 mM Ammonium Bicarbonate (~1ug/uL concentration).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5kri6","text":"11. Determine the protein concentration of the supernatant using BCA (use 5uL of 10X dilution sample).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1bch","text":"12. Transfer 20ug per condition into a pre-washed tube and adjust to a final volume of 100uL with 100mM AmBiC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b5mid","text":"13. Add 1 ug of modified trypsin solution overnight at 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fdtrk","text":"14. Add 8uL of formic acid to the sample to quench the reaction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b5jjg","text":"15. Speedvac to dry peptide sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ccapu","text":"Add lysis buffer to final concentration 1% SDS using 100mM AmBiC and protease inhibitor cocktail (1:100 dilution) in 1.5 mL tubes. This is generally 10E6 cells but can be adjusted for 10E4-10E7. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6n1ep","text":"Submit samples to 3 cycles at 90C and RT incubation as follows: shake at 800 rpm for 10 min at 90C in temperature controlled thermal shaker and incubate at RT for 10 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"821rf","text":"Add ~60 uL of 100 mM DDT (final conc. 10 mM) to samples and incubate for 30 min at RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8quqd","text":"Add ~60 uL of 500 mM IA (final conc. 50 mM) to samples and incubate for 30 min at RT in the dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2riej","text":"Transfer samples to 15 mL tubes (~700 uL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqj9g","text":"Perform precipitation by adding 700 ul of -20C cold acetone (same volume of the sample) and 7200 mL of -20C cold methanol (9 volumes of the sample) and incubate overnight at -80C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"39t1t","text":"Samples can be cleaned up using C18 (Protocol 003) and/or Magnetic beads (Protocol 006).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: BAF_Protocol_007 Solution Digest with Protein Precipitation
title_html: BAF_Protocol_007 Solution Digest with Protein Precipitation
